channel.title: Java Bug System
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [JDK-8314136] Test java/net/httpclient/CancelRequestTest.java failed: WARNING: tracker for HttpClientImpl(42) has outstanding operations
item.description:

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
A pull request was submitted for review.
Branch: master
URL: https://git.openjdk.org/jdk21u-dev/pull/1686
Date: 2025-04-21 09:29:28 +0000

Fix request [21u]

I backport this for parity with 21.0.8-oracle.
No risk, only a test change
Clean backport.
Test passes. SAP nightly testing passed.
